name: Ricocheter
description:
The game is a FPS without directly shooting your enemies.

Created for Game Maker 's Tool kit Jam2018

So you are tasked with killing all the enemies creatively by Ricocheting your bullets that you fire but be careful as even your own bullets can kill you!

Green surfaces are surfaces that allow your bullet to ricochet

Game Design & Concept: Chua Yu jia

Game Art : Chua Yu Jia, Baxter

Programming: Ng E-Tjing

Game music: Nitro fun - Cheat Codes (Monster Cat Release)

Pistol shot sound from http://www.freesfx.co.uk
